front.title: A Proposal for a Requirement for IP Local Mobility

abstract.t: In draft-kempf-netlmm-nohost-req-01.txt, a set of requirements for a protocol for localized mobility management has been described. In this draft, we propose to include an additional requirement that components of existing IETF protocols should be reused wherever possible to avoid extensive standardization activity and to enable reuse of existing IETF-compliant protocol implementations.
